verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: When the earth is shaken with its earthquake.
And the earth casts out its burdens.
And man says, “What’s the matter with it?”
On that day, it will report its chronicles.
Because your Lord will have inspired it.
On that Day, the people will emerge in scattered groups to be shown their deeds.
Whoever has done an atom’s weight of good will see it.
And whoever has done an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
